description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

Copies source stand structure value for forested polygons, otherwise returns NOT_APPLICABLE. NFL polygons are null for layer type so will be assigned NOT_APPLICABLE. Source stand structure is only based on forest layers 1, 2 and 3, not on herbs and shrubs. Stand structure is a stand level attribute in the SFVI but is always defined in layer 1 table. Layer 2 and 3 also have the attribute but no values.

Count layers up to max of 6. Layers are the forest species for layers 1, 2 and 3, the shrub layer, the herb layer, and a stand-level nfl layer that can be one of nvsl, aquatic_class, luc or transp_class. Only the first species is included for each forest layer as there are no cases where species 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 are included without species 1. nvsl is the predominant non-veg cover type and can occur when there is forest info. 6 layers is therefore possible.
